item.title: It is better to marry than to burn with passion
item.description: This was just an interesting verse from my bible reading today. To the unmarried and the widows I say that it is good for them to remain single, as I am. But if they cannot exercise self-control, they should marry. For it is better to marry than to burn with passion. (1 Corinthians 7:8–9) Going through 1 Corinthians myself for the first time has been a very interesting journey.
item.content:encoded:
This was just an interesting verse from my bible reading today.

To the unmarried and the widows I say that it is good for them to remain single, as I am. But if they cannot exercise self-control, they should marry. For it is better to marry than to burn with passion. (1 Corinthians 7:8–9)

Going through 1 Corinthians myself for the first time has been a very interesting journey. Onwards we go.
